title: Chasing Trouble
description: Two years ago, Ashley Parker walked into Nathan William's life. He's pushed her away, hurt her more times than he cares to remember, and chased after when she walked into another man's arms. After over a year of radio silence, she shows up in California, looking for closure. But Nathan is determined to not let her go this time.This time, trouble takes on a whole new meaning.
author: Courtney B. Jones
